abstract: Timothy C. Davidson, Brandon E. Lacoff and Gregory H. Skidmore, three executives at Belpointe Asset Management, an investment firm based in Greenwich, Conn., won $254.2 million in the Powerball game, the largest jackpot in the state’s history.
snippet: Timothy C. Davidson, Brandon E. Lacoff and Gregory H. Skidmore, three executives at Belpointe Asset Management, an investment firm based in Greenwich, Conn., won $254.2 million in the Powerball game, the largest jackpot in the state’s history.

headline.main: 3 Asset Managers Win $254 Million Powerball Lottery
